name: 1688搜索页面商家和旺旺链接高亮测试
description: 在搜索结果页面高亮商家列表容器和单个供应商的旺旺链接，保持高亮便于观察

nodes.name: 等待搜索结果完全加载

config.script: console.log('🔍 开始高亮商家列表容器...'); const merchantSelectors = ['.sm-offer-item', '.offer-item', '.sm-offer', '[class*=offer]']; let totalHighlighted = 0; merchantSelectors.forEach(selector => { const elements = document.querySelectorAll(selector); if (elements.length > 0) { console.log(`✅ 找到选择器 ${selector}: ${elements.length} 个商家容器`); elements.forEach((el, index) => { if (index < 10) { el.style.border = '4px solid red'; el.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(255, 255, 0, 0.4)'; el.style.boxShadow = '0 0 10px red'; el.style.zIndex = '9999'; const title = el.querySelector('h4, [class*=title], a[title]'); const company = el.querySelector('[class*=company], [class*=name], [class*=shop]'); console.log(`  商家 ${index + 1}: ${title ? title.textContent.trim().substring(0, 30) : '无标题'} - ${company ? company.textContent.trim().substring(0, 20) : '无公司名'}`); totalHighlighted++; } }); } else { console.log(`❌ 选择器 ${selector}: 未找到元素`); } }); console.log(`总共高亮了 ${totalHighlighted} 个商家容器`); return { success: true, type: 'merchant_highlight', totalHighlighted: totalHighlighted, message: `已高亮 ${totalHighlighted} 个商家容器，红色边框和黄色背景`, timestamp: new Date().toISOString() };

console.log('📞 开始高亮旺旺链接...'); const contactSelectors = ['[class*=contact]', '[class*=chat]', '[class*=im]', '[class*=旺旺]', '.sm-im', '.s-im']; let totalContactHighlighted = 0; contactSelectors.forEach(selector => { const elements = document.querySelectorAll(selector); if (elements.length > 0) { console.log(`✅ 找到联系方式选择器 ${selector}: ${elements.length} 个元素`); elements.forEach((el, index) => { if (index < 20) { el.style.border = '3px solid blue'; el.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.5)'; el.style.boxShadow = '0 0 8px blue'; el.style.zIndex = '10000'; const merchantItem = el.closest('.sm-offer-item, .offer-item, .sm-offer, [class*=offer]'); const merchantTitle = merchantItem ? merchantItem.querySelector('h4, [class*=title], a[title]') : null; console.log(`  旺旺链接 ${index + 1}: ${el.textContent.trim().substring(0, 15)} - 商家: ${merchantTitle ? merchantTitle.textContent.trim().substring(0, 20) : '未知'}`); totalContactHighlighted++; } }); } else { console.log(`❌ 联系方式选择器 ${selector}: 未找到元素`); } }); console.log(`总共高亮了 ${totalContactHighlighted} 个旺旺链接`); return { success: true, type: 'contact_highlight', totalContactHighlighted: totalContactHighlighted, message: `已高亮 ${totalContactHighlighted} 个旺旺链接，蓝色边框和青色背景`, timestamp: new Date().toISOString() };

console.log('✅ 最终验证高亮效果...'); const merchantContainers = document.querySelectorAll('[style*="border: 4px solid red"]'); const contactElements = document.querySelectorAll('[style*="border: 3px solid blue"]'); console.log(`验证: 找到 ${merchantContainers.length} 个高亮的商家容器`); console.log(`验证: 找到 ${contactElements.length} 个高亮的旺旺链接`); merchantContainers.forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 5) { const title = el.querySelector('h4, [class*=title], a[title]'); console.log(`商家容器 ${i+1}: ${title ? title.textContent.trim().substring(0, 30) : '无标题'}`); } }); contactElements.forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 5) { console.log(`旺旺链接 ${i+1}: ${el.textContent.trim().substring(0, 20)}`); } }); return { success: true, merchantCount: merchantContainers.length, contactCount: contactElements.length, message: '高亮验证完成，请检查浏览器中的高亮效果', timestamp: new Date().toISOString() };

nodes.name: 保持页面打开（不要关闭）
